title: How MASZ works
description: A user spams in your chat. But you don't know whether you should mute or ban him? Is this his first time being offensive? Well, look up his profile and events on MASZ! See everything your moderators ever wrote about this user and punish him accordingly.

title: Transparency
description: By using MASZ your server moderation will become much more transparent for your members. There will be no more untraceable bans or incidents, users can either view an incident on the website or be informed via notifications.

title: Feature rich
description: Use automoderation, temporary punishments, moderation events, webhooks, fileuploads or the discord bot to keep track of anything that happens on your server.

title: Dashboard
description: Use a simple and intuitive dashboard to keep up with any moderation events on your server.

title: Moderation cases
description: The core of MASZ are moderation cases, a case represents a rule violation, an important note or similar. The server members and your moderators can be notified individually upon case creation.

title: Automoderation
description: Create and configure rules, filters and actions or punishments for various events that happen on your server. For example you can delete the message and auto mute a user if he posts an discord invite.

title: Bot commands
description: Getting raided? Use quick and simple bot commands directly in discord to mute or ban those raiders!

title: Selfhosting
description: The application can be selfhosted using Docker. Follow our step by step guide to setup your own MASZ instance.

title: I cannot selfhost
description: For a small fee per month I will host you a server, get you a domain and provide technical support. Feel free to contact me in discord: zaanposni#9295 or via mail.

title: Open Source
description: The source code can be found on GitHub. Contributions are welcome!
